name: Audacious Control
summary: A simple plug-in which let you control your Audacious right within Vim
description:
You can control your Audacious right within your Vim.

Displaying playlist (you can navigate through it and select the song to play),
Play/Pause/Stop Audacious,
Jumping forward/backward in playlist,
Turning on/off Shuffle play,
Turning on/off Repeat,
Getting info about the current playing song,
Increasing/decreasing volume,
And Shutting down Audacious.

Also this plugin provides a menu for gVim users.

versions.release_notes: BUGFIX: Fixed a typo which caused deletion of the last item in playlist (Thanks to Milad Rastian)
